data.text: Kɨ Amos, kɨ Tekoan nguibar ekiamɨn gumazim, egha kɨ sipsipbar garir gumazim. Kɨ irebamɨn mɨn garir bizimɨn garima, God akar kam na ganɨngi. Dughiar kamɨn, Usia Judan kantrin atrivimɨn itima, Joasɨn otarim Jeroboam, Israelɨn kantrin atrivimɨn iti. Kɨ bizir kam irebamɨn mɨn an ganigha gɨvazɨ, azenir pumuning gɨvazɨma, mɨkɨmkɨzim oto.
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ avim isɨ Atrivim Hasaelɨn dɨpenim mɨkɨnightɨ,
Kɨ nguibar ekiar kam Damaskus, an ainɨn tiar akabar dɨvazir gavgaviba bar ada akararigham.
“Ia oragh! Ikiavɨra Itir God Akar Gavgavir kam ia ganɨga ghaze,
Egh kɨ Asdotɨn nguibamɨn itir gumazamiziba bar me batuegh,
“Ia oragh! Ikiavɨra Itir God Akar Gavgavir kam ia ganɨga ghaze,
Kɨ avim isɨ Tairɨn dɨvazim mɨkɨnighɨva,
“Ia oragh! Ikiavɨra Itir God Akar Gavgavir kam ia ganɨga ghaze,
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ Temanɨn Distrighɨn avim akunightɨ a magɨram.
“Ia oragh! Ikiavɨra Itir God Akar Gavgavir kam ia ganɨga ghaze,
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ avim isɨ Raban nguibar ekiamɨn dɨvazibav kɨnightɨ,
Eghtɨ Amonɨn atrivim uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko me mangɨ
